title: Native Compilation issue: io.netty.handler.codec.compression.BrotliOptions failed
body:
### Describe the bug

I have a standalone app which I am trying to build in native image. It is giving java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.aayushatharva.brotli4j.encoder.Encoder$Parameters

Source Code: https://github.com/himanshumps/quarkus-wrk.git

Complete Error Trace:

Detailed message:
```
Error: Class initialization of io.netty.handler.codec.compression.BrotliOptions failed. Use the option --initialize-at-run-time=io.netty.handler.codec.compression.BrotliOptions to explicitly request delayed initialization of this class.

### Expected behavior

The application should build without errors

### Actual behavior

Error: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/aayushatharva/brotli4j/encoder/Encoder$Parameters

### How to Reproduce?

There is a github action associated with the repository. Use that to run/see the error.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

11

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.4.2

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
